# Protein {sec-protein}

```{r}
#| label: fig-decom
#| echo: false
#| out-width: 100%
#| fig-align: center
#| fig-cap: The Protein module visualizes the primary structure of proteins
knitr::include_graphics("9_rtemislive_0.93.75_ProteinSequence.jpeg")
```

The Protein module allows visualizing the primary structure, i.e. amino acid sequence,
of proteins.

It allows multiple types of annotations:

- Site annotations
- Disease variants
- Region annotations
- Post-translational modifications
